name: OVP
description: Website for strategy consulting specialists. Minimalist design, with animated morphing svg elements. Based on Nuxt with some WebGL elements and smooth scroll. Designed by Jagoda Kondratiuk.

name: Ease DeFi
description: DeFi insurance platform Ease.org decided to branch out to make meme coins saver. We have build couple of projects with safe meme coin launches protecting the users from hacks and rug-pulls. Apps based on React and Next

name: Jagoda
description: Portfolio website for designer Jagoda Kondratiuk. No framework used, with help of Request Animation Frame for smooth scroll and animation and transitions.

name: Bright Union
description: DeFi insurance platform built on Vue.js. Bright Union helps to navigate, search for and buy insurance covers for your crypto.

name: Neosephiri
description: Shopify e-commerce website for a high end skin care product.
